metadata.title: Global Surface Boundary Conditions

creators.name: University of Illinois, Department of Atmospheric Sciences

metadata.description: Grids of surface boundary conditions (sea surface temperature; sea ice concentration, snow/no snow) at monthly intervals, 1972-1986; grids correspond to spectral resolution (r15, r30, t42) of atmospheric general circulation models; coverage is global.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To grid surface boundary conditions at monthly intervals from 1972-1986.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Contact Contributor

Use constraints: None
